Description: Egyptian chief complaining to Napoleon, in balcony, standing on the right with arms open, Napoleon sitting on the left, three other officers standing behind; after Horace Vernet; illustration from George Moir Bussey's 'History of Napoleon' (Joseph Thomas, London, 1840) Wood-engraving
Bibliographic references: De Vinck 1909-1967 / Collection De Vinck. Un siècle d'histoire de France par l'estampe. Inventaire analytique. (undescribed)
Associated names: Representation of: Napoléon I, Emperor of the French (Napoleon)
Associated events: Associated Event: French Campaign in Egypt and Syria 1798-1801
